name: Wished Away
description:
"Lost little lamb, far away from home
"Find your truth, or forever lone you'll roam."

You, May, a thirteen-year-old girl, have lost your memory. You must walk the Memory Lane to retrieve your memories. Without them, you cannot return home.
The more you find out about your life, however, the less sure you are if you want to go home at all.
Which choices will you make?
